list_definition.definition: a person who tries to find criminals or watches suspected persons

list_ex_of_english: We were assured by the police that the sources of information for private detectives were not police sources.
I believe that we must do all we can to recruit more detectives.
In total, the number of detectives and other experts involved in all these activities has been increased by 150.
I cannot take a walk down the street without the detectives beside me.
I know that it has been stated that the detectives are in a different building, but that is not true.
Detectives will he able, if the draft goes ahead, to eavesdrop on doctors, psychiatrists, social workers and journalists.
Detectives lent to assist in elucidating any specially serious crime are not charged for.
I agreed particularly about the use which private detectives make of bugging devices.
